Discover how NettZero can help you adopt custom-made, effective and scalable sustainability practices. While also creating enormous and visible socio-economic impact.

idea: Internset is an advanced AI-powered platform that helps companies to build their future workforce by creating virtual internship programs to train and hire college students. The platform allows employers to easily automate their first layer processes like sourcing, background verification, screening, and orientation to integrate into existing talent acquisition channels through company-branded virtual internships. For universities and colleges, it allows Training and Placement (T&P) departments to invite “Nearby” employers to conduct integrated video interviews and connect with diversified talent pools, as well as participate across multiple virtual career fairs.
name: INTERNSET PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: VLISTENERS - An Ear For Elders

idea: Digifine is an educational institute offering unique digital marketing courses in India. Our main aim is to impart high-caliber digital marketing training to our learners across India. Our courses focus on an extensive strategic and practical approach, learning through live ad campaigns and corporate projects and providing exceptional industry insights.
name: Digifine

idea: Kanai makes plant-based, Ayurveda inspired beauty products that have been internationally recognized and featured in British Vogue as well as earned an international award nomination in New York. We were the first Indian beauty brand to be featured in the Oscar nominee gift bags. We work closely with women farmers and give 2% from our sales to the Rural Development Institute Dehradun to extend our support to women and children in the remotest regions of the Himalayas. Our philosophy is to use the wisdom of our ancestors and create products that reflect a new, emerging India keeping in mind global safety and formulation standards. Founded by Aditi Gaur who has worked for one of the largest beauty brands in the world, Aditi Gaur was felicitated at the British Parliament as one of the emerging leaders in beauty in 2019. Aditi wants to create safe and clean beauty products that can compete with the biggest brands in the world, using ingredients that are indigenous to India and also bringing in more women at the grassroots level.
name: Kanai Organics
